title: The Belfry Witches
description: Meet Old Noshie and Skirty Marm - the naughtiest witches in the world. Together they always spell trouble! Old Noshie and Skirty Marm have committed a terrible crime. They've sung a frightfully rude song about the Queen of the Witches at the Hallowe'en Ball. Now they are to be banished from Witch Island for ever! But where can they go? The sleepy village of Tranters End is about to become home to two wacky witches, a wonderfully snooty cat - and a whole lot of trouble! Three extremely funny books, now in one bumper volume!
author: Kate Saunders
